visitors.title: Our Valued Visitors
visitors.description: We take pride in serving a diverse range of guests, from local families to international travelers, all seeking the authentic flavors of Hejazi cuisine.

teama.title: To'mah Restaurant
teama.description: A culinary gem in the heart of Medina, To'mah offers a unique dining experience that combines the rich heritage of Hejazi cuisine with modern hospitality. Our restaurant is a place where tradition meets innovation, creating unforgettable meals for every guest.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: flavors of traditional Hejazi cuisine in a modern and inviting setting. What began as a dream to revive authentic Saudi dishes with a contemporary twist, quickly grew into a beloved destination for those seeking warmth, heritage, and exceptional taste. At To’mah, every dish tells a story — a story of home, culture, and unforgettable flavor.

ambiance.title: Our Ambiance
ambiance.description: Inspired by the historic homes of Medina, our decor features over 100-year-old doors, traditional fabrics, volcanic stones, and local plants that create an atmosphere of heritage and nostalgia.

0.text: Probably the most authentic Saudi dining experience I've ever had. Everything was perfect, and the service was outstanding. A must-visit.
0.name: TripAdvisor Review

1.text: The only restaurant all locals love. It’s always packed, and for a reason. The food is excellent and truly worth the hype.
1.name: TikTok user review

2.text: Exploring a wonderful dining experience at To’mah — a beautiful blend of heritage, hospitality, and flavor.
2.name: Foodie TikTok video

4.text: Enjoy a welcoming atmosphere that tells the stories of the Tomah family, who take pride in offering authentic flavors that reflect a deep history and a rich cultural legacy.
4.name: HiHome Experience

5.text: Experience the rich flavors of Al Madinah at To'mah Restaurant, where every dish reflects traditional recipes and authentic Madani heritage.
5.name: Visit Saudi Official Website

cta.title: Why Visit To'mah?
cta.description: Experience more than just food — experience tradition, warmth, and a piece of Medina's soul.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become one of the best restaurants specializing in traditional cuisine, known for its service, quality, speed of service, and innovative concept

heritage.title: Cultural Heritage
heritage.description: To introduce and spread the culture of Medina's cuisine

quality.title: Quality Focus

quality.description: Only the finest ingredients make it to your plate

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Discover the perfect blend of tradition and innovation at To'mah. Our passionate chefs create memorable dining experiences with the finest ingredients and authentic recipes.

idea_section.heading: The Idea of To’mah Began On

menu.menu.description: Explore our diverse menu featuring traditional Hejazi dishes, grilled specialties, and seasonal delights. Each dish is crafted with care to bring you the authentic flavors of Medina.
menu.title: Our Menu

hero.title: Our Partners
hero.description: We collaborate with the finest suppliers and work alongside talented individuals to bring you an exceptional dining experience.

cta.title: Become a Partner
cta.description: We're always looking to collaborate with quality suppliers and influential personalities who share our passion for exceptional food and service.

menu_showcase.order_now_desc: Discover our seasonal specials and chef’s recommendations
menu_showcase.experience_desc: From traditional flavors to modern twists, our dishes are crafted to delight your senses.
menu_showcase.beef_joints_desc: Indulge in grilled beef joints served with rich tahini sauce. A delicious meal rich in protein and authentic grilled flavors.
menu_showcase.tomah_kebab_desc: Indulge in premium special kebab served with delicious nuts and rich tahini sauce. A royal meal rich in luxurious flavors and fresh ingredients.
menu_showcase.tahini_kebab_desc: Indulge in special kebab grilled over charcoal and topped with rich and delicious tahini sauce. A delicious meal rich in grilled flavors and distinctive tahini.
menu_showcase.roqaq_desc: Crispy Roqaq Dough Filled With Pistachios And Cream And Served With Ice Cream
menu_showcase.cream_caramel_desc: Oven Baked Cream caramel served cold caramelized sugar sauce
menu_showcase.um_ali_desc: Dessert made of roqaq with milk and roasted nuts served hot
